title: Didsbury — Light Oak Kitchen
summary: Full refit including electrics, quartz worktops, and LED lighting scheme. Complete transformation of 1930s kitchen.

images.alt: Oak kitchen with quartz island and pendant lighting
Detail of cabinet joinery and soft-close mechanisms

testimonial.quote: Tidy team, clear schedule, great finish. Couldn't be happier with our new kitchen.
testimonial.author: J. Smith, Didsbury

title: Sale — Porcelain Patio & Steps
summary: Modern porcelain patio with raised planters and integrated lighting. Complete rear garden transformation with drainage solutions.

images.alt: Modern UK patio with porcelain tiles and raised planters
Closeboard fence with landscaped border planting
Sandstone patio with natural stone steps

testimonial.quote: Clear timeline, no surprises on price, and they kept the neighbours happy. The patio drains perfectly—no pooling even after heavy rain.
testimonial.author: Dan & Priya K., Sale

title: Chorlton — Contemporary Garden Design
summary: Full garden redesign with artificial grass, sleeper borders, and contemporary planting scheme. Low-maintenance solution for busy family.

images.alt: Contemporary garden with artificial grass and sleeper borders
UK rear garden transformation with decking and planting
Block paved driveway and front garden landscaping

testimonial.quote: Good communication and a tidy site. We lived through the works; dust kept down and doors sealed. The lighting plan makes a big difference.
testimonial.author: Michael O., Chorlton

title: Wilmslow — Sandstone Patio & Garden
summary: Large sandstone patio with raised planters, drainage solutions, and mature tree integration.

testimonial.quote: Transformed our back garden completely. Professional from start to finish.
testimonial.author: M. Johnson, Wilmslow

title: Altrincham — Open Plan Kitchen Extension
summary: Single-storey extension with bi-fold doors, handleless kitchen units, and coordinated utility room.

images.alt: Open plan kitchen extension with bi-fold doors
Kitchen island with breakfast bar seating

testimonial.quote: Exceeded expectations. The project management was excellent throughout.
testimonial.author: R. Williams, Altrincham
